trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Classic Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/), and then click **+NEW** at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Classic Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/), and then click **+NEW** at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Click on **App Services**, then **Service Bus**, then **Notification Hub**, then **Quick Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **App Services**, then **Service Bus**, then **Notification Hub**, then **Quick Create**.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a service bus namespace that you want create the hub in, select your **Namespace Name**.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a service bus namespace that you want create the hub in, select your **Namespace Name**.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you can use the default **Namespace Name** which will be created based on the hub name as long as the namespace name is available.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, you can use the default **Namespace Name** which will be created based on the hub name as long as the namespace name is available.

trans-unit.source: Once the namespace and notification hub are created, your namespaces in service bus will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Once the namespace and notification hub are created, your namespaces in service bus will be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Click the namespace that you just created your hub in (usually ***notification hub name*-ns**).
trans-unit.target: Click the namespace that you just created your hub in (usually ***notification hub name*-ns**).

trans-unit.source: On your namespace page, click the **Notification Hubs** tab at the top, and then click on the notification hub you just created.
trans-unit.target: On your namespace page, click the **Notification Hubs** tab at the top, and then click on the notification hub you just created.

trans-unit.source: This will open the dashboard for your new notification hub.
trans-unit.target: This will open the dashboard for your new notification hub.

trans-unit.source: On the dashboard for your new hub click **View Connection String**.
trans-unit.target: On the dashboard for your new hub click **View Connection String**.

trans-unit.source: Take note of the two connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Take note of the two connection strings.
